name: Run! Human! Run! Alpha Release
description:
Hello there, I'm William.

Thanks for (Hopefully) playing Run! Human! Run!

This a game I have been making during my most anxious and depressed moments. It has been an amazing help in combating both. Its pre alpha but you get the feel.

I designed this game to be picked up and put down at any time. It requires no serious time to complete. Each level is standalone with a few features that carry over between scenes that hopefully add some character to the game.

I programmed this in c# and 3D modelled everything in the game myself using Blender, except for the trees (Which I am currently making) and used a combination of my own textures and free commercially licenced textures to make the world feel like real life. I have credited all the authors for the textures used in the credits section. 

Although I made this game myself, I had a lot of love and support from my friends, I had help bringing Paul to life with the help of my amazing actor friend Andy. Also I learnt to program in HTML and CSS with the help of my best friend Tony.
